imdb.title: Ô dorobô Jing
imdb.plot: Story about master-thief Jing and his exploits to steel everything he deems valuable in the world. His also has a talking albatross Kir for a sidekick.

episodes.title: 1st Shot: The Capital of Thieves
episodes.plot: Jing and Kir try to steal the Double Mermaid jewels.

episodes.title: 2nd Shot: The Ghost Ship of Blue Hawaii
episodes.plot: Jing and Kir go to a casino which they find out is powered by greed and desire.

episodes.title: 3rd Shot: The Adonis Capital of Time - Part 1
episodes.plot: Jing and Kir go to a town run on time and they rescue a girl named Mirabelle from being executed. They find out that the crime in the town is being late, if you are more then five seconds late, you die.

episodes.title: 4th Shot: The Adonis Capital of Time - Part 2
episodes.plot: Mirabelle is being hunted by Adonis who is wanted for several time-related crimes. Jing and Kir hatch a plan so they can try to infiltrate the castle and try to stop the clock.

episodes.title: 5th Shot: The Little Girl from Technicolor Town
episodes.plot: Jing and Kir help a small girl who is the daughter of an artist who wants to complete his final art piece before he dies.

episodes.title: 6th Shot: The Eternal City of Revaiva - Part 1
episodes.plot: Jing and Kir find out about a city that has eternal life.

episodes.title: 7th Shot: The Eternal City of Revaiva - Part 2
episodes.plot: Jing, Kir and Vermouth are continuing sailing to Reviva. The king there is proud of Jing and wants to make him the king of Reviva.

episodes.title: 8th Shot: Don't Drop the Por Vora
episodes.plot: Jing and Kir go to try to find a rare Sun Stone.

episodes.title: 9th Shot: The Musical Island of Coco-Oco
episodes.plot: Jing and Kir have arrived to the musical island of Coco-Oco. Kir gets mad at Jing and flies away but is rescued by a girl named Mimosa and Jing tries to find out the Ocarina of the Moon.

episodes.title: 10th Shot: The Lullaby of the Por Vora
episodes.plot: Jing finds about the secret of Por Vora City.

episodes.title: 11th Shot: The Masquerade Ball of ZaZa - Part 1
episodes.plot: Jing and Kir accidentally go to a gladiator bullfighting show.

episodes.title: 12th Shot: The Masquerade Ball of ZaZa - Part 2
episodes.plot: Jing gets to the advanced stage of the Black Corrida and must face Cube a.k.a. The Warrior of the Rising Son.

episodes.title: 13th Shot: The Masquerade Ball of ZaZa - Part 3
episodes.plot: Jing and Cube continue their fight.
